description: Sweet, floral, and just a little tart. You may get hints of peach and lemonade, even wine.

region: Mandheling (Fair Trade; Organic), Northern Aceh Region
description: If you're unfamiliar with Sumatran coffees they can surprise you. Adjectives like 'rustic' and 'earthy' are often used to describe Sumatran varieties, and flavors tend to register mostly at the back of the palate. Malty, a little sweet, and maybe even an herbal hint, this is a very nice variety.
